instructions.1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease one 9x13 inch baking dish.
instructions.2: Place potatoes in bottom of prepared dish.
instructions.3: Combine the 1/2 cup butter, condensed soup, cheese, sour cream, salt and onion; mix well and pour over potatoes. Top with crushed corn flakes and drizzle with 1/2 cup melted butter.
instructions.4: Bake uncovered at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 45 minutes.

questions.question: In Step 3, is the potatoes from Step 2 being used?
Is potatoes from Step 2 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is cheese from Step 3 still available in Step 4?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 4?
If we skip Step 2, is it still valid to pour the potatoes in Step 3?
Can we place (Step 2) and uncover (Step 4) at the same time?
